article.title: Bechtel Provides Nuclear Propulsion Under $360 Million Contract Modification
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Bechtel Marine Propulsion Corporation, San Francisco, California, is being awarded a $359.7 million cost-plus-fixed-fee contract modification for nuclear propulsion work at the Bettis Atomic Power Laboratory and Knolls Atomic Power Laboratory.Â The Naval Sea Systems Command is the contracting activity.
